item.title: JadeCTF2022 ++Game
item.description: ++game is a web challenge that was part of the 2022 Jade CTF. In order to get the flag, we had to beat an impossible game. Overview After registering, the game greets us with our current score and a button to increase it. Each time we click the button, the score is increased by 1. To protect itself from automated requests, a valid reCAPTCHA token is required to increase the score.
